titleStmt.title: The Psalms of David translated from the Vulgat.
titleStmt.author: Caryll, John, 1625-1711.

notesStmt.note: First edition of this translation by John Caryll.--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Pages 49, 278, 280 and 334 are misnumbered 46, 218, 220 and 384 respectively.
This item appears at reel as B2621 (number cancelled in 2nd ed.) at reel 1377:4, and at reel 1682:2 as Wing (2nd ed.) B2628.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1682:2 lacks the three errata leaves that appear in the preliminaries at reel 1377:4.
Reproduction of original in: University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library (reel 1377:4) and British Library (reel 1682:2).
